Description: Your forehead burns like hot coals as you slam your head into a creature. Make a melee attack roll, dealing fire damage on a hit. After activating this move, your AC decreases by 2 until the beginning of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 7d12 at level 17.
